result.title: UrBIOfuture website
result.description: Sustainable Innovations will be responsible for the development of an appealing website, based on the previous worked carried out to create a project visual identity, that will extend to all the project’s supports (templates, website, social media…). On the website, visitors will be able to access general information of the project, as well as the latest news on events and milestones achieved. It will also provide the main results of the activities carried out on the WP 2, 3 and 4. The website will provide access to a private area where partners will be able to upload all relevant documents of the project.
